Cookie Preferences

Functional and operational cookies

This type of cookie is essential for the proper functioning of our website. The use of cookies allows our website to remember and provide a more personalized online experience. They allow you to navigate our website, use our features, and use our features, including: setting your privacy preferences, logging into the site, or filling out forms. They make it impossible to navigate between pages or use some important features of our website.This type of cookie is essential for the proper functioning of our website. The use of cookies allows our website to remember and provide a more personalized online experience. They allow you to navigate our website, use our features, and use our features, including: setting your privacy preferences, logging into the site, or filling out forms. They make it impossible to navigate between pages or use some important features of our website.

Usage example:

  • to recognize you when you log in to our system to use our services
  • find out if you are a member of clubs and communities within the system and provide other customized features
  • provide features that can help you
  • to track your interactions with site pages
  • to avoid fraudulent activities
  • increase the level of security
  • to keep track of your preferences
  • we also use cookies to understand how customers use our services so we can improve them
  • we use cookies for research and diagnostic purposes to improve content and products
  • measuring and understanding the effectiveness of our services.

Performance cookies (and analytics)

This type of cookie collects information that helps us understand the performance of the website and gives an idea of how the site is currently being used. We can improve it for visitors.? You may use these cookies to obtain information about which areas you have visited or how long you have spent on the website. And if you disable these cookies and we will not know when you were on the site.

Advertising cookies

To provide promotional content from partners that is more relevant to your interests on our or other sites. They can be used to deliver targeted advertising. If you disable these cookies, ads may not be targeted. And you will see more inappropriate ads that you may not be interested in

Examples of advertising partners:

  • Google AdWords
  • Facebook Pixel
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter Analytics
  • Cision
  • Microsoft Bing Ads
